product_name: Lowepro Toploader Pro 70 AW Camera Case
long_description: Designed for serious outdoor photographers, the Lowepro Toploader Pro 70 AW camera case offers a contoured, asymmetric shape and all-weather cover that help protect a DSLR and 24 - 70mm lens. Side opening with easy access lets you pull out your camera in a flash to capture quick shots. Integrated all-weather AW Cover(TM) lets you access the main compartment without exposing your gear to rain or snow; cover stows in a small front pocket when not in use. 8.3 x 6.7 x 6.7 in. interior size holds a professional DSLR with a 24 - 70mm lens attached; adjustable divider system in main compartment organizes your gear. High-density, closed-cell foam and soft nylon lining protect camera and accessories. Large zipper pulls are easy to grasp, even in wet and cold conditions. 3-point harness provides a custom, comfortable fit and holds the bag securely next to your chest during active movements. Top pocket provides space for sunglasses and other small items. Lowepro Toploader Pro 70 AW camera case can be used with a belt or Lowepro Topload Zoom chest harness (sold separately).
short_description: Designed for serious outdoor photographers, the Lowepro Toploader Pro 70 AW camera case offers a contoured, asymmetric shape and all-weather cover that help protect a DSLR and 24 - 70mm lens.
